issue.title: [Gandiva] Generate object ids for modules
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4371](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4371). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Generate object identifiers for Projector and Filter, so that we can test the external layer to C++ if the identifier is the same to ensure that caching is not broken.

Introduce JNI api to query for the same.

However this is not of high priority since we have tests in the core gandiva layer for the same.

Current tests depend on time but it is causing spurious failures.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4371?focusedCommentId=17565590) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
